About Abbey Bar
Established in 2006, Abbey Bar is one of the original Craft Beer Bars in Volusia County and Central Florida. Abbey has been awarded many honors including Imbide Magazine’s Top 100 Beer Bars in America, Ratebeer’s Top 20 Beer Bars in the World, listed on 100 Bars to Visit Before You Die, and many others.
Abbey specializes in Craft Beer from Florida, across the US and the World. We pride ourselves in our knowledge of the beers we serve as well as flavor, history, and the science behind beer.
In addition to an every changing menu of Adventurous Beer, Noteworthy Wines, and Creative Meads, Abbey offers a unique menu of upscale bar fare that is prepared fresh daily.
Visit Us
117 N Woodland Blvd. DeLand FL 32720
(386) 734-4545
